headline.main: 2 CATHOLIC LEADERS ASSAIL WAR ENTRY; Joseph Scott, Once Knights of Columbus Head, Hits 'Compromise' With Reds BOTH NATION-WIDE ON AIR Archbishop Beckman Asserts Alliance With the Soviet Is Peril to Democracy

lead_paragraph: CHICAGO, Oct. 19 -- Appeals to the President, to the clergy of America, and to religious laymeri of the nation to help save the United States from war were voiced today by a high Roman Catholic churchman and a distinguished layman in nation-wide radio broadcasts.
abstract: aid to USSR including compromise with communism assailed by Archbishop Beckman and J Scott
